articles.title: Rihanna fans joke star did ‘bare minimum’ at £4m wedding gig for son of Asia’s richest man after lack-l... - The US Sun
articles.description: RIHANNA fans have said she did the “bare minimum” while performing at the pre-wedding bash for the son of Asia’s richest man. The supporters slammed the star for not putting on a …
articles.content:
RIHANNA fans have said she did the "bare minimum" while performing at the pre-wedding bash for the son of Asia's richest man.
